Info:
Fashion Point in ASSI Road Varanasi

A well-known garment retailer Fashion Point in ASSI Road makes available choicest of clothes for men women and children. Founded in (year) this shop has been catering to different budget and tastes with customers flowing in from different corners of the city. From embroidered traditional clothes to western outfits the place has an almost endless collection for the customers. The shop has a professional sales team who help the buyers choose dresses that suit their personality and look. A lot of customers in the past have appreciated this place not only for its high quality products but also for the outstanding service it provides. It holds a prominent location on ASSI Road and owing to this favourable location finding the establishment is a piece of cake for the customers. The locality around is friendly developed and is connected with the rest of the city by means of frequently available public and private transportation.

Services Offered at Fashion Point

Fashion Point in Varanasi holds a commodious showroom with separate sections for men women and kids each handled by a knowledgeable sales personnel. The sprawling shop has a special lifestyle section which has an excellent stock of branded and locally manufactured sunglasses caps footwear belts wallets perfumes and much more. Customers have access to a wide assortment of colours sizes designs and patterns under a single roof making this place a one-stop garment shop for the residents. The shop has both ready-made and unstitched varieties leaving an option for the buyers to select as per their need. Payments are accepted in Cash. The shop operates from Monday - Sunday between 10:30 - 20:30.
